segments.text: I see the adult woman focused on polishing that plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and dress, looking so domestic and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But water is gushing from the sink, flooding the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and her shoe is soaked through.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed at all, her eyes are glued to the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, the cabinet doors are wide open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the cookie jar is full, and the boy's hand is diving in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced precariously on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll tumble down with cookies flying everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her palm up, eagerly anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, thinking they can get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light, showing the tidy yard outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the chaos inside feel even more out of place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the stool will tip and someone will get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears if the mom doesn't turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
